data.title: Britany Murphy & husband Simon
data.text:
Author Topic: until death do us apart - Britany Murphy & husband Simon Orange

Knowflake

Posts: 3716

From: Georgia

Registered: May 2009

posted November 17, 2015 10:46 PM I stumbled upon these two love birds today while browsing the net and thought of their tragic story.

I dont know much about them, tbh, but for what I recall , this beautiful and promising Scorpio actress met and married the charming Pisces brit, and despite many people disapproving of their relationship, they got married. Apparently she was under the spell of her husband the entire time - doing exactly what he wanted, almost like brainwashed. That's just the gossip. She overused the drugs, was anemic, depressed and whatnot. She died at the tender age of 32.

Her husband died 6 months later, apparently heartbroken over her death.

Here is their synastry and Composite. I see an exact Eros-Psyche conjunction in the Composite.

Her birth time is known. His birth time is not known.

What do you think made him so powerful in her life to the point she was absorbed by him.

What made them die months apart, there must have been some serious attachment / co dependency going on...

The synastry features a Pluto-Moon opposition, along withe the Nodes. His Saturn opposes her Moon and Venus and squares her Mars ( submissive to him).

I see the dreaded ( by me) Saturn - Chiron conjunction - I found this synastrical aspect very hard to break, I mean - the proverbial glue. Seems like these two followed each other in the grave.

==================

====================

Synastry:

posted November 17, 2015 11:38 PM I would check Eurydike and Orpheus in their synastry and composite as well as natals and I would check for atropos, ophelia and ceres.

I would check for pyramus and thisbe.

hypatia238

Moderator

Posts: 2982

From: AC-Neptune Quintile AMOR

Registered: Sep 2014

posted November 18, 2015 12:12 AM In Midpoint they have an exact AMOR conjunct MOON which conjuncts by 3d JUNO.

They have a AMOR-MOON-JUNO-CERES midpoint composite stellium. They also have the LOVE stellium with Venus conjunct Horus under 1d. In Davison they have SUN-MERCURY-JUNO tight stellium.

^all that explains the strong love, devotion and commitment to one another.

Now on to the spooky stuff!

In Davison there is a YOD:

EURYDIKE in VIRGO @29d00

ATROPOS in SCORPIO @29d23

OPHELIA in CAPRICORN @28d16

SATURN in GEMINI @29d54 retro

PYRAMUS in GEMINI @28d44 retro

SOUTHNODE in GEMINI @28d33

So we have Saturn-Pyramus-Southnode at the apex of the YOD inconjuncting ATROPOS sextile OPHELIA! Yes that did just happen. To top it off Atropos also sextiles exact Eurydike and is at the most karmic degree of the zodiac Scorpio @29d.

posted November 19, 2015 12:07 AM hypathia,

their story and death is such a mystery. This young woman, full of life and vigor, got sucked into a strange vortex leading to her death. And his afterwards, both of them in their 30s.

here is what I just read:

The death of Brittany Murphy is under renewed scrutiny after her father, Angelo Bertolotti, revealed a report from a private lab saying the actress had high levels of heavy metals in her system  evidence he says shows she and husband Simon Monjack were deliberately poisoned.
